function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Dispersal of coronaviruses on surfaces in built environments","Impact":"Increased risk of surface-to-person transmission of SARS-CoV-2 and other similar viruses","Mitigation":"Regular and thorough cleaning of surfaces, use of antimicrobial materials, and promoting hand hygiene","Technologies":"Antimicrobial coatings, ultraviolet germicidal irradiation, and air purification systems","People":"Occupants and visitors of built environments","Owner":"Building owners and facility managers"},{"Description":"Facilitated dispersal of SARS-CoV-2 in office environments and public transport systems with restricted airflow","Impact":"Higher likelihood of person-to-surface-to-person transmission and aerosol concentration in the air","Mitigation":"Improving ventilation, air filtration, and air circulation techniques, and promoting the use of personal protective equipment","Technologies":"HVAC systems, air purifiers, and directional airflow control devices","People":"Occupants and users of office environments and public transport systems","Owner":"Building owners, public transportation authorities, and employers"},{"Description":"Virus survival on surfaces for prolonged periods","Impact":"Increased potential for surface-to-person transmission even after several days","Mitigation":"Regular cleaning and disinfection, reducing surface touchpoints, and use of antimicrobial materials","Technologies":"Antimicrobial coatings, self-cleaning surfaces, and ultraviolet disinfection systems","People":"Occupants and visitors of built environments","Owner":"Building owners and facility managers"}]}
